summary: Canaan was an ancient civilization in the Middle East, around 1400 BC. It was an important area where different powerful empires met. Archaeologists have found many interesting things at places like Tel Hazor and Megiddo. The Bible often mentions Canaan as the "Promised Land." The people who lived there were called Canaanites, and they spoke a language called Semitic. Some experts believe that the culture of the Israelites was similar to the Canaanites'. Later, the Canaanites became known as Phoenicians, and they even had a colony in Africa called Carthage.
title: Canaan
